DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Ventilator Use Status Less Than 24 Hour Prior Biospecimen Collection Study Site Verbal Confirmation Received Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Verification from the site that the donor was ventilated (on life support) for less than 24 hours prior to the estimated procurement start time.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Ventilator Use Status Less Than 24 Hour Prior Biospecimen Collection Study Site Verbal Confirmation Receive
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._A medical device that facilitates breathing._To put into action or service._A condition or state at a particular time._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._Earlier in time or order._The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes._A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._Expressed in spoken words._Having been established or verified._To take, accept, or get something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Ventilator Use Status Less Than Integer::24 Hour Prior Biospecimen Collection Study Site Verbal Confirmation Receive
Property.preferredDefinition: A medical device that facilitates breathing.:To put into action or service.:A condition or state at a particular time.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Earlier in time or order.:The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.:A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:Expressed in spoken words.:Having been established or verified.:To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: A medical device that facilitates breathing.
To put into action or service.
A condition or state at a particular time.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.
A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.
To take, accept, or get something offered.
